title: Robert MacNeil
content: Robert Breckenridge Ware MacNeil OC (January 19, 1931 – April 12, 2024) was a Canadian-American journalist, writer and television news anchor. He partnered with Jim Lehrer to create the landmark public television news program The Robert MacNeil Report in 1975.[1] He co-anchored the program until 1995. The show eventually became the MacNeil/Lehrer NewsHour and is today the PBS NewsHour.
